trans-unit.source: Represents a control that enables a user to select a date by using a visual calendar display.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que permite que um usuário selecione uma data usando uma exibição visual do calendário.

trans-unit.source: A Calendar control can be used on its own, or as a drop-down part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> control.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de calendário pode ser usado por conta própria, ou como parte da lista suspensa um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Calendar supports only the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O calendário suporta apenas o calendário gregoriano.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the Calendar.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir fornece informações sobre tarefas que são normalmente associadas com o calendário.

trans-unit.source: |Task|Implementation| |----------|--------------------| |Have the Calendar display a month, an entire year, or a decade.|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> property to Month, Year, or Decade.| |Specify whether the user can select a date, a range of dates, or multiple ranges of dates.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>.| |Specify dates that cannot be selected.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates%2A> property.| |Specify the range of dates that the Calendar displays.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.| |Specify whether the current date is highlighted.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Tarefa | Implementação | |----------|--------------------| | Ter o calendário exibir um mês, um ano inteiro ou uma década. | Defina a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>como mês, ano ou década. | | Especifique se o usuário pode selecionar uma data, um intervalo de datas ou vários intervalos de datas. | Use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>. | | Especificar as datas que não pode ser selecionado. | Use a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates%2A>. | | Especifique o intervalo de datas que exibe o calendário. | Use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>e propriedades <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>. | | Especifique se a data atual é realçada. | Use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> is `true`.| |Change the size of the Calendar.|Use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> or set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> `true`. | | Alterar o tamanho do calendário. | Usar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>ou defina a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> properties of a Calendar, the actual calendar does not change its size.| The Calendar control provides basic navigation using either the mouse or keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Observe que, se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>Propriedades de um calendário, o Calendário real não altera seu tamanho. | O controle de calendário fornece navegação básica usando o mouse ou teclado.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir resume a navegação de teclado.

trans-unit.source: |Key Combination|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>|Action| |---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| |ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>.| |ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Combinação de teclas | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>| Ação | |---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| | SETA | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>não está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>. | | SETA | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o mês do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Observe que não altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | SETA | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o ano de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |SHIFT+ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>, extends the range of selected dates.| |HOME|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> to the first day of the current month.| |HOME|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the first month of the year.
trans-unit.target: Observe que não altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | SHIFT + SETA | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>não estiver definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>, estende o intervalo de datas selecionados. | | PÁGINA INICIAL | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>para o primeiro dia do mês atual. | | PÁGINA INICIAL | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o mês do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>ao primeiro mês do ano.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |HOME|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the first year of the decade.
trans-unit.target: Não altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | PÁGINA INICIAL | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o ano do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>para o primeiro ano da década.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |END|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> to the last day of the current month.| |END|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the last month of the year.
trans-unit.target: Não altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | TÉRMINO | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>para o último dia do mês atual. | | TÉRMINO | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o mês do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>para o último mês do ano.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |END|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the last year of the decade.
trans-unit.target: Não altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | TÉRMINO | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o ano do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>para o último ano da década.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |CTRL+UP ARROW|Any|Switches to the next larger <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Não altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | CTRL + SETA PARA CIMA | Qualquer | Alterna para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> maior próxima</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> is already <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, no action.| |CTRL+DOWN ARROW|Any|Switches to the next smaller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, nenhuma ação. | | CTRL + SETA PARA BAIXO | Qualquer | Alterna para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> menores próximo</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> is already <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, no action.| |SPACEBAR or ENTER|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Switches <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> represented by focused item.| ## Customizing the Calendar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Calendar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, nenhuma ação. | | Barra de espaços ou ENTER | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Alterna <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>representado pelo item focalizado. | # # Personalizando controle de calendário para aplicar as mesmas configurações de propriedade para vários controles de calendário, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para que o controle uma aparência exclusiva.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Calendar, see [Calendar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e os estados que são específicos para o calendário, consulte [modelos e estilos de calendário](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Calendar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual só terá efeito se essa propriedade é presente no modelo padrão do controle de calendário e é definida usando um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Você pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na seção "Alterando o Visual estrutura de um controle de" [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do elemento de objeto de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de datas que são marcados como não selecionável.

trans-unit.source: Dates in this collection will appear gray and crossed out on the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Datas nesta coleção aparecerá cinza e transversais sair no calendário.

trans-unit.source: To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A> method provided by the collection returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar tudo após as datas não selecionável, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>método fornecido pela coleção retornada por essa propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* One or more object elements of type .
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do elemento de propriedade de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* um ou mais elementos de objeto do tipo .

trans-unit.source: A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de datas que não podem ser selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> associated with the control's internal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> associada ao controle interno <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *resourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *resourceExtension* um dos seguintes: `StaticResource` ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: *styleResourceKey* The key that identifies the resource being requested.
trans-unit.target: *styleResourceKey* a chave que identifica o recurso que está sendo solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a um recurso existente em <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.CalendarItemStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.CalendarItemStyle*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.CalendarItemStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date to display.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data para exibir.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayDate and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> properties specify what the calendar displays and what has focus within the calendar.
trans-unit.target: O DisplayDate e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>propriedades especificam o calendário exibe e que tem o foco no calendário.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> only when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> is set to Month, but the user might change the DisplayDate when the Calendar is in Year and Decade mode.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>somente quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>é definida como mês, mas o usuário pode alterar o DisplayDate quando o calendário está no modo de ano e década.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the mode changes the DisplayDate.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve como o modo de DisplayDate é alterado.

trans-unit.source: |DisplayMode|Action| |-----------------|------------| |Month|DisplayDate changes when the user navigates to a different month.| |Year|The month of DisplayDate changes when the user clicks or navigates to a different month.| |Decade|The year of DisplayDate changes when the user clicks or navigates to another year.| DisplayDate is ignored if its value is outside of the range of dates that is specified by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: | DisplayMode | Ação | |-----------------|------------| | Mês | DisplayDate muda quando o usuário navega para um outro mês. | | Ano | O mês de DisplayDate muda quando o usuário clica ou navega para um outro mês. | | Década | O ano de DisplayDate muda quando o usuário clica ou navega para outro ano. | DisplayDate será ignorado se o seu valor está fora do intervalo de datas que é especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **true**|| # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *dateTimeString* uma data que está em um dos formatos que é listada no [de sintaxe XAML DateTime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tópico.

trans-unit.source: The date to display.
trans-unit.target: A data para exibir.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.Today%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref:System.DateTime.Today%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*>propriedade é alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> is assigned its new value.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre após <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>recebe seu valor novo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last date in the date range that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a última data no intervalo de datas que está disponível no calendário.

trans-unit.source: You can restrict the range of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and DisplayDateEnd properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode restringir o intervalo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>e as propriedades de DisplayDateEnd.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range.
trans-unit.target: Um usuário não é possível rolar para ou selecionar datas fora desse intervalo.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to a date that is after DisplayDateEnd, DisplayDateEnd is set to the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>propriedade para uma data que é após DisplayDateEnd, DisplayDateEnd é definido como o mesmo valor como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **true**|| # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *dateTimeString* uma data que está em um dos formatos que é listada no [de sintaxe XAML DateTime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tópico.

trans-unit.source: The last date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: A última data em que está disponível no calendário.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a primeira data que está disponível no calendário.

trans-unit.source: You can restrict the range of a Calendar by setting the DisplayDateStart and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode restringir o intervalo de calendário, definindo a DisplayDateStart e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range.
trans-unit.target: Um usuário não é possível rolar para ou selecionar datas fora desse intervalo.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to a date that is before DisplayDateStart, DisplayDateStart is set to the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>propriedade para uma data que seja antes DisplayDateStart, DisplayDateStart é definido como o mesmo valor como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.

trans-unit.source: The first date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: A primeira data que está disponível no calendário.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the calendar displays a month, year, or decade.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o calendário exibe um mês, ano ou década.

trans-unit.source: A Calendar can display a month, a year, or a decade.
trans-unit.target: Um calendário pode exibir um mês, ano ou uma década.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how the user navigates to each mode.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista como o usuário navega para cada modo.

trans-unit.source: |DisplayMode|Action| |-----------------|------------| |Month|To navigate to Year mode, click the month heading.| |Year|To navigate to Decade mode, click the year heading.
trans-unit.target: | DisplayMode | Ação | |-----------------|------------| | Mês | Para navegar para o modo de ano, clique no título do mês. | | Ano | Para navegar para o modo de década, clique no título do ano.

trans-unit.source: To navigate to Month mode, click one of the displayed months.| |Decade|To navigate to Year mode, click one of the displayed years.| ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**||
trans-unit.target: Para navegar para o modo de mês, clique em um dos meses exibidos. | | Década | Para navegar para o modo de ano, clique em um dos anos exibidos. | # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **true**||

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates what length of time the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> should display.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica o período de tempo a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> deve ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode*>propriedade é alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the day that is considered the beginning of the week.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o dia em que é considerado o início da semana.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DayOfWeek> that represents the beginning of the week.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DayOfWeek>que representa o início da semana.</xref:System.DayOfWeek>

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek*> that is determined by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek*>que é determinado pela cultura atual.</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek*>

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.FirstDayOfWeek*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.FirstDayOfWeek*>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current date is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a data atual é realçada.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **true**| Nenhum | # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ```

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current date is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a data atual é realçada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> control when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: Cria a árvore visual para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> controlar quando um novo modelo é aplicado.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado sempre que o código do aplicativo ou um processo interno, como a recriação de passagem de layout, chama o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"></xref> for use by the [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/add/includes/silverlight-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"> </xref> para uso pelo [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/add/includes/silverlight-md.md)] infra-estrutura de automação.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> instance if one has not been created for the control instance; otherwise, it returns the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> previously created.
trans-unit.target: Esse método cria um novo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>instância se não foi criada para a instância do controle; caso contrário, retorna o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>criado anteriormente.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayModeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayModeChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> eventos roteados que ocorre quando o usuário pressiona uma tecla enquanto este controle tem foco.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> overrides the OnKeyDown method to support keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>substitui o método OnKeyDown para oferecer suporte à navegação de teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when a keystroke, such as pressing an ARROW key, performs a navigation action.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>eventos como manipulada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados do evento para `true` quando um pressionamento de tecla, como pressionar uma tecla de direção, executa uma ação de navegação.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user releases a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a manipulação de classe para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> eventos roteados que ocorre quando o usuário solta uma tecla enquanto este controle tem foco.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A> method to support keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A>método para oferecer suporte à navegação de teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event data.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação não altera o estado manipulado (o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade) da <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>dados de evento.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged"> </xref> eventos roteados.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O controle gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged>evento chamando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral sobre eventos roteados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionModeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionModeChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the currently selected date.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data selecionada atualmente.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| Use this property when is set to .
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **true**|| Use esta propriedade quando é definida como .

trans-unit.source: In other modes, this property will always be the first date in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Em outros modos, essa propriedade sempre será a primeira data no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *dateTimeString* uma data que está em um dos formatos que é listada no [de sintaxe XAML DateTime](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tópico.

trans-unit.source: The date currently selected.
trans-unit.target: A data selecionada no momento.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified date is outside the range specified by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd*> -or- The specified date is in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates*> collection.
trans-unit.target: A data especificada está fora do intervalo especificado por <> </> *> e <> </> *> - ou - a data especificada está no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates*>

trans-unit.source: If set to anything other than <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*> is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se definida como algo diferente de <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>está definido como <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of selected dates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de datas selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: Dates can be added to the collection either individually or in a range using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Datas podem ser adicionadas à coleção individualmente ou em um intervalo usando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property, adding a date or range to the collection may cause it to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo do valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>propriedade, adicionar uma data ou um intervalo para a coleção pode fazê-lo a ser apagada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> affects the SelectedDates property.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>afeta a propriedade SelectedDates.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: |CalendarSelectionMode|Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|No selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: | CalendarSelectionMode | Descrição | |---------------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| Nenhuma seleção é permitidas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> cannot be set and no values can be added to SelectedDates.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Only a single date can be selected, either by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> or the first value in SelectedDates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>não pode ser definida e nenhum valor pode ser adicionado ao SelectedDates. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| Somente uma única data pode ser selecionada, ou definindo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>ou o primeiro valor SelectedDates.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> cannot be used.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|A single range of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>não pode ser usado. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| Um único intervalo de datas pode ser selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, adding a date individually to SelectedDates, or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will clear all previous values from SelectedDates.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Definindo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, adicionando uma data individualmente para SelectedDates ou usando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>limpará todos os valores anteriores de SelectedDates. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| Vários intervalos não-contíguo de datas podem ser selecionados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a date individually to SelectedDates or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will not clear SelectedDates.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando uma data individualmente para SelectedDates ou usando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>não limpará SelectedDates.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> will still clear SelectedDates, but additional dates or ranges can then be added.
trans-unit.target: Configuração <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>ainda limpará SelectedDates, mas outras datas ou intervalos podem ser adicionados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.| ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects* One or more object elements.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar um intervalo que inclui algumas datas que já estão selecionadas ou sobreposições com outro intervalo resulta na união dos intervalos e não faz com que uma exceção. | # # Uso do elemento de propriedade XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects* um ou mais elementos de objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> object that contains the currently selected dates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém as datas selecionadas no momento.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a coleção retornada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates*>propriedade é alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates*>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged"> </xref> eventos roteados.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates what kind of selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica o tipo de seleções são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the current selection mode.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica o modo de seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Provides a text representation of the selected date.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma representação de texto da data selecionada.

trans-unit.source: A text representation of the selected date, or an empty string if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação de texto da data selecionada ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*>é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*>
